title: Executive Order 10107-Revocation of Executive Order No. 8232 of September 5, 1939, Relating to the Control of the Panama Canal and the Canal Zone
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 8 of title 2 of the Canal Zone Code, approved June 19, 1934, and as President of the United States, it is ordered that Executive Order No. 8232 of September 5, 1939, entitled "Control of the Panama Canal and the Canal Zone", be, and it is hereby, revoked.

HARRY S. TRUMAN
THE WHITE HOUSE,
February 8, 1950
citation: Harry S Truman, Executive Order 10107-Revocation of Executive Order No. 8232 of September 5, 1939, Relating to the Control of the Panama Canal and the Canal Zone Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/231734
